title: Versailles no Bara Gaiden
original_name: ベルサイユのばら外伝
sinopse:
The Versailles no Bara Gaiden series is a collections of short stories written by Riyoko Ikeda. These stories were published in two separate magazines in 1974 (first publication) after the serialization of the manga Versailles no Bara, and 1984-1985 (second publication).

(Source: Wikipedia)
